help.short: Name of the App Service plan.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="installScripts">
<prop type="array" name="registryAdapters">
<prop type="array" name="storageMounts">
<prop type="array" name="capabilities" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="locations">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: Name of the App Service plan.

command.name: create

help.short: Name of the App Service plan.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$appServicePlan.sku.capabilities" options="capabilities">
<arg type="array" var="$appServicePlan.sku.locations" options="locations">

<help short="If true, this App Service Plan will attempt to scale asynchronously if there are insufficient workers to scale synchronously. If false, this App Service Plan will only attempt sync scaling."/>
<help short="If Hyper-V container app service plan true, false otherwise."/>
<arg type="array" var="$appServicePlan.properties.installScripts" options="install-scripts" group="Properties">
<help short="If true, this App Service Plan owns spot instances."/>
<help short="Obsolete: If Hyper-V container app service plan true, false otherwise."/>
<help short="If true, apps assigned to this App Service plan can be scaled independently. If false, apps assigned to this App Service plan will scale to all instances of the plan."/>
<help short="If true, RDP access is enabled for this App Service plan. Only applicable for IsCustomMode ASPs. If false, RDP access is disabled."/>
<arg type="array" var="$appServicePlan.properties.registryAdapters" options="registry-adapters" group="Properties">
<help short="If Linux app service plan true, false otherwise."/>
<arg type="array" var="$appServicePlan.properties.storageMounts" options="storage-mounts" group="Properties">
<help short="If true, this App Service Plan will perform availability zone balancing. If false, this App Service Plan will not perform availability zone balancing."/>

json.schema:
<userAssigned action="create" type="array" name="userAssigned" arg="$appServicePlan.identity.userAssigned">
<prop type="array" name="installScripts" arg="$appServicePlan.properties.installScripts">
<prop type="array" name="registryAdapters" arg="$appServicePlan.properties.registryAdapters">
<prop type="array" name="storageMounts" arg="$appServicePlan.properties.storageMounts">
<prop type="array" name="capabilities" arg="$appServicePlan.sku.capabilities" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="locations" arg="$appServicePlan.sku.locations">

<prop type="array" name="installScripts">
<prop type="array" name="registryAdapters">
<prop type="array" name="storageMounts">
<prop type="array" name="capabilities" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="locations">

command.name: update

help.short: Name of the App Service plan.

command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$appServicePlan.sku.capabilities" options="capabilities">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$appServicePlan.sku.locations" options="locations">

help.short: The list of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}

command.argGroup:
<help short="If true, this App Service Plan will attempt to scale asynchronously if there are insufficient workers to scale synchronously. If false, this App Service Plan will only attempt sync scaling."/>
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$appServicePlan.properties.installScripts" options="install-scripts" group="Properties">
<help short="If true, this App Service Plan owns spot instances."/>
<help short="If true, apps assigned to this App Service plan can be scaled independently. If false, apps assigned to this App Service plan will scale to all instances of the plan."/>
<help short="If true, RDP access is enabled for this App Service plan. Only applicable for IsCustomMode ASPs. If false, RDP access is disabled."/>
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$appServicePlan.properties.registryAdapters" options="registry-adapters" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$appServicePlan.properties.storageMounts" options="storage-mounts" group="Properties">
<help short="If true, this App Service Plan will perform availability zone balancing. If false, this App Service Plan will not perform availability zone balancing."/>

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="installScripts">
<prop type="array" name="registryAdapters">
<prop type="array" name="storageMounts">
<prop type="array" name="capabilities" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="locations">

<prop type="array" name="installScripts" arg="$appServicePlan.properties.installScripts">
<prop type="array" name="registryAdapters" arg="$appServicePlan.properties.registryAdapters">
<prop type="array" name="storageMounts" arg="$appServicePlan.properties.storageMounts">
<prop type="array" name="capabilities" arg="$appServicePlan.sku.capabilities" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="locations" arg="$appServicePlan.sku.locations">
